Skinned knees. Playing in the local park from noon to dusk. Friendships that began with fights and morphed into partnerships-of-crime. Falling asleep in the safety of mother's lap. And heartbreak? Your friend getting the Pokemon collector deck before you did.

If there is any place untainted and unscarred by the sometimes shape edges of adolescence, it's childhood: akin to a warm afternoon when the world was exactly as it was supposed to be and all the happiness ever was right within one's reach. No matter what decade you are traveling in, the taste of childhood lingers on one's tongue like Heaven's unforgettable elixir.

To capture again this very essence of childhood that still tugs at out heartstrings, Apratim '16 is back this year with the theme 'Relive your Childhood'. Come join us as we walk down those lanes again and splash around in those (very muddy?) memories.

Its time to reunite with our inner child again!
